original_text:
King of Babylon
La recente slot gratis King of Babylon di Shuffle Master riprende lo scenario storico dell’antica Babilonia, che era la più grande città del mondo. Puoi vedere un po’ di città sullo sfondo del gioco, in particolare i Giardini pensili di Babilonia. Il gioco è progettato in modo eccellente, con una grafica impeccabile e una colonna sonora d’effetto che si adatta perfettamente al tema storico. Scopriamo insieme la modalità di gioco e le varie funzionalità extra.
Struttura di questa slot senza scaricare
Il gioco è progettato come una slot a 5 rulli con 20 linee di pagamento attive. Non è una slot che rilascia enormi ricompense, arriva ad un massimo di 1.000X con un RTP del 96,47%. Le caratteristiche principali di King of Babylon sono:

gli Action Spins
gli Scatter
i Jolly in espansione
i Giri Gratuiti
il King stesso è presentato come il simbolo jolly e ha un ruolo importante nel gioco.

Per iniziare l’azione nella slot King of Babylon, devi piazzare una scommessa che può essere compresa tra 0,20€ e 100,00€ con una puntata di linea che varia da 0,01€ a 5,00€. Con un pagamento massimo di 1.000 volte la puntata, puoi vincere fino a 100.000,00€.
Come si gioca a King of Babylon e quali sono i simboli principali?
Quando sei pronto per giocare, premi il pulsante GIRA situato al centro della barra. Sul lato sinistro del pulsante GIRA troverai il pulsante GIOCO AUTOMATICO che puoi attivare se vuoi giocare a mani libere su King of Babylon. La simbologia è formata da:

Simboli reali A, K, Q e J
Spade
Statue di cani
Leoni
Cittadella
Creature alate
Il simbolo jolly è presentato dal Re di Babilonia, mentre il simbolo Scatter è un Dado.

Caratteristiche del bonus slot King of Babylon

Il simbolo jolly sostituisce tutti i simboli regolari tranne il simbolo scatter. Quando il simbolo jolly appare sulla bobina, può espandersi casualmente e trasformarsi in un Golden Wild. I simboli Wild e Golden Wild non compaiono durante i Free Spins.
I Dadi sono il simbolo scatter. Il simbolo scatter può apparire su tutti i rulli sia nel gioco base che nei giri gratuiti. Su ogni bobina possono apparire fino a tre simboli scatter. Se ottieni sei o più simboli di dadi in un singolo giro, vincerai Free Spins. Il numero di giri gratuiti ricevuti equivale al numero di simboli di dadi che atterrerai in un singolo giro
Funzione Action Spins – Questa funzionalità può darti moltiplicatori o giri di azione extra. Durante gli Action Spins della ruota, ci sono tre round che possono regalare fantastici premi fino a 1.000 volte la puntata.

Pensieri finali sulla slot in demo King of Babylon
King of Babylon offre un’ottima combinazione di funzionalità, buoni pagamenti e ottimo RTP. Quindi, se sei un fan delle slot storiche, puoi provare un giro di ruota . Se sei abbastanza fortunato, attiverai la funzione Action Spins e vincerai grandi ricompense, se invece preferisci il tema egiziano, scopri nella nostra vetrina le nuove video slot giocabili nei migliori casinò online selezionati per te!

raw_translation.response:
King of Babylon
The recent free slot game King of Babylon by Shuffle Master takes inspiration from the historical setting of ancient Babylon, the greatest city of the world. You can see a glimpse of the city in the background of the game, particularly the Hanging Gardens of Babylon. The game is excellently designed, with impeccable graphics and an effective soundtrack that perfectly fits the historical theme. Let's explore the gameplay and the various extra features together.

Structure of this no-download slot
The game is designed as a 5-reel slot with 20 active paylines. It's not a slot that releases huge rewards, reaching a maximum of 1,000X with an RTP of 96.47%. The main features of King of Babylon are:

Action Spins
Scatters
Expanding Wilds
Free Spins
The King himself is presented as the wild symbol and plays an important role in the game.

To start the action in the King of Babylon slot, you need to place a bet that can range from €0.20 to €100.00 with a payline bet ranging from €0.01 to €5.00. With a maximum payout of 1,000 times the bet, you can win up to €100,000.00.

How to Play King of Babylon and What Are the Main Symbols?
When you're ready to play, press the SPIN button located in the center of the bar. On the left side of the SPIN button, you'll find the AUTOPLAY button that you can activate if you want to play hands-free on King of Babylon. The symbols are formed by:

Royal Symbols A, K, Q and J
Swords
Dog Statues
Lions
Citadel
Winged Creatures
The wild symbol is presented by the King of Babylon, while the scatter symbol is a Dice.

Bonus Features of the King of Babylon Slot

The wild symbol replaces all regular symbols except for the scatter symbol. When the wild symbol appears on the reel, it can randomly expand and transform into a Golden Wild. The Wild and Golden Wild symbols do not appear during the Free Spins.

Dices are the scatter symbol. The scatter symbol can appear on all reels in both the base game and the Free Spins. Up to three scatter symbols can appear on each reel. If you get six or more dice symbols in a single spin, you will win Free Spins. The number of Free Spins received equals the number of dice symbols landed in a single spin.

Action Spins Feature – This feature can give you multipliers or extra action spins. During the wheel's Action Spins, there are three rounds that can give fantastic rewards up to 1,000 times the bet.

Final Thoughts on the King of Babylon Demo Slot
King of Babylon offers an excellent combination of features, good payouts, and excellent RTP. So, if you're a fan of historical slots, you can take a spin. If you're lucky enough, you'll trigger the Action Spins feature and win big rewards. If you prefer the Egyptian theme, check out our showcase of the new video slots playable in the best online casinos selected for you!

review_with_topics.prompt:
Below is a review for the slot game "King of Babylon".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Gameplay features (Action Spins, Scatters, Expanding Wilds, Free Spins)
Symbols (King, Dice)
Payouts and rewards
Betting range
Game RTP

- No FAQ
- No Notes

Review: King of Babylon
The recent free slot game King of Babylon by Shuffle Master takes inspiration from the historical setting of ancient Babylon, the greatest city of the world. You can see a glimpse of the city in the background of the game, particularly the Hanging Gardens of Babylon. The game is excellently designed, with impeccable graphics and an effective soundtrack that perfectly fits the historical theme. Let's explore the gameplay and the various extra features together.

Structure of this no-download slot
The game is designed as a 5-reel slot with 20 active paylines. It's not a slot that releases huge rewards, reaching a maximum of 1,000X with an RTP of 96.47%. The main features of King of Babylon are:

Action Spins
Scatters
Expanding Wilds
Free Spins
The King himself is presented as the wild symbol and plays an important role in the game.

To start the action in the King of Babylon slot, you need to place a bet that can range from €0.20 to €100.00 with a payline bet ranging from €0.01 to €5.00. With a maximum payout of 1,000 times the bet, you can win up to €100,000.00.

How to Play King of Babylon and What Are the Main Symbols?
When you're ready to play, press the SPIN button located in the center of the bar. On the left side of the SPIN button, you'll find the AUTOPLAY button that you can activate if you want to play hands-free on King of Babylon. The symbols are formed by:

Royal Symbols A, K, Q and J
Swords
Dog Statues
Lions
Citadel
Winged Creatures
The wild symbol is presented by the King of Babylon, while the scatter symbol is a Dice.

Bonus Features of the King of Babylon Slot

The wild symbol replaces all regular symbols except for the scatter symbol. When the wild symbol appears on the reel, it can randomly expand and transform into a Golden Wild. The Wild and Golden Wild symbols do not appear during the Free Spins.

Dices are the scatter symbol. The scatter symbol can appear on all reels in both the base game and the Free Spins. Up to three scatter symbols can appear on each reel. If you get six or more dice symbols in a single spin, you will win Free Spins. The number of Free Spins received equals the number of dice symbols landed in a single spin.

Action Spins Feature – This feature can give you multipliers or extra action spins. During the wheel's Action Spins, there are three rounds that can give fantastic rewards up to 1,000 times the bet.

Final Thoughts on the King of Babylon Demo Slot
King of Babylon offers an excellent combination of features, good payouts, and excellent RTP. So, if you're a fan of historical slots, you can take a spin. If you're lucky enough, you'll trigger the Action Spins feature and win big rewards. If you prefer the Egyptian theme, check out our showcase of the new video slots playable in the best online casinos selected for you!

The wild symbol replaces all regular symbols except for the scatter symbol. When the wild symbol appears on the reel, it can randomly expand and transform into a Golden Wild. The Wild and Golden Wild symbols do not appear during the Free Spins.

Dices are the scatter symbol. The scatter symbol can appear on all reels in both the base game and the Free Spins. Up to three scatter symbols can appear on each reel. If you get six or more dice symbols in a single spin, you will win Free Spins. The number of Free Spins received equals the number of dice symbols landed in a single spin.

Action Spins Feature – This feature can give you multipliers or extra action spins. During the wheel's Action Spins, there are three rounds that can give fantastic rewards up to 1,000 times the bet.

Final Thoughts on the King of Babylon Demo Slot
King of Babylon offers an excellent combination of features, good payouts, and excellent RTP. So, if you're a fan of historical slots, you can take a spin. If you're lucky enough, you'll trigger the Action Spins feature and win big rewards.
